about_the_game:
In the distant ancient times. Human beings are living happily, but one day a super life body, Magic Star, suddenly appeared in the universe. He wandered in the universe and was about to devour Mother Earth. The end is coming. Humans are very scared. The Five Immortals are the last hope of mankind. They flew to the planet to investigate and stop him from moving forward! Many strange forms of life were found on this planet. Finally, they understood that this magic star was a weapon used in war and was implanted with a program. His mission was to devour all the major planets. After destroying his own planet, he became a wandering planet. Only the main brain system of Demon Star has been eliminated. To save the earth, fight young!

Player 1 (wsad) is up, down, left and right (jkl) is the attack jump block skill

About "Five Immortals" is a gorgeous action fighting game!

About this game, it is a very magical game! The game has created a strange world! There are all kinds of strange life in this world! Inspiration from the brain!

Unique and excellent fighting: defeat the opponent under any circumstances, experience the passion of fighting, and give full play to the potential!

AI: The opponent has strong strength and wisdom, and he will try to knock you down.

Secret: There are many secrets and surprises waiting for you to explore!

Hope: I hope you like this game, and I hope you can enjoy it!
detailed_description:
In the distant ancient times. Human beings are living happily, but one day a super life body, Magic Star, suddenly appeared in the universe. He wandered in the universe and was about to devour Mother Earth. The end is coming. Humans are very scared. The Five Immortals are the last hope of mankind. They flew to the planet to investigate and stop him from moving forward! Many strange forms of life were found on this planet. Finally, they understood that this magic star was a weapon used in war and was implanted with a program. His mission was to devour all the major planets. After destroying his own planet, he became a wandering planet. Only the main brain system of Demon Star has been eliminated. To save the earth, fight young!

Player 1 (wsad) is up, down, left and right (jkl) is the attack jump block skill

name: Wuxian

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows
  • Processor: 1GHz 32-bit or 64-bit processors
  • Graphics: 128 MB video memory
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows
  • Processor: Inter(R)Core(TM)i5-7400 CPU @ 3.00GHz 3.00GHz
  • Graphics: 256 MB video memory
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 2 GB available space

short_description: This is an independent game! It has a unique way of playing. I hope you can enjoy it! It's definitely worth it!
